entries.title: Google launches ChatGPT rival called Bard
entries.description: The tech giant says its new Artificial Intelligence-powered chatbot will roll out in the coming weeks.

entries.title: 'Google killer' ChatGPT sparks AI chatbot race
entries.description: The future of internet search could be transformed by this new tech, writes BBC tech editor Zoe Kleinman.

entries.title: Tech lay-offs: Dell to cut workforce
entries.description: Dell adds to the growing list of technology companies cutting jobs as consumer and corporate spending shrinks.

entries.title: The app allowing fans to invest in their favourite musicians
entries.description: Swedish company Corite is setting itself up as an alternative to record labels.
